fact.container

Class PixelSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject
      • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingCollection<E>
        • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingSet<CameraPixel>
          • fact.container.PixelSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CameraMapOverlay, Serializable, Iterable<CameraPixel>, Collection<CameraPixel>, Set<CameraPixel>

    public class PixelSet
extends com.google.common.collect.ForwardingSet<CameraPixel>
implements CameraMapOverlay, Serializable, Iterable<CameraPixel>
    This class implements a set like container for FACT Camera Pixels. It can also draw itself in the Viewer.
    See Also:

        Returns:

        public boolean containsAllCHIDs(int[] chids)
        Test if every pixel whose chid is given in chids is in the pixel set
        Parameters:
        chids -
        Returns:
        true iff all pixels are in the pixelset else false

      • toCHIDArray

        public int[] toCHIDArray()
        Convert the set to an integer array of CHIDs
        Returns:
        array containing all chids of the pixels in the set

      • toBooleanArray

        public boolean[] toBooleanArray()
        Convert pixelset to a boolean array, array[chid] == True means, that the pixel is in the set.
        Returns:
        boolean mask of pixels in the set.

      • fromBooleanArray

        public static PixelSet fromBooleanArray(boolean[] mask)
        Create a PixelSet from a boolean mask of length N_PIXELS
        Parameters:
        mask - boolean array, array[chid] == True means the pixel will be added to the Set
        Returns:
        PixelSet
